title: Ticket #5991: Schedd error removing jobs?
description:
job_dagman_rm just failed on Fedora23: 

  07:42:26 NodeZ exited
  07:42:26 Verifying output
  07:42:26 Error: found job_dagman_rm-NodeZ-job.6.finished; NodeZ jobs should have been condor_rm'ed
  Error: All expected files and correct output failed

Interestingly, the SchedLog says this: 

  11/03/16 07:42:16.309 (pid:3155076) (D_ALWAYS) Job 6.0 aborted: removed because <OtherJobRemoveRequirements = DAGManJobId =?= 1> fired when job (1.0) was removed
  ..
  11/03/16 07:42:25.376 (pid:3155076) (D_ALWAYS) scheduler universe job (6.0) pid 3178420 exited with status 0

Note that this job is waiting for the parent DAGMan job to disappear, and then exiting itself, so this probably isn't as bad as if that job was never supposed to exit. (Hmm -- maybe the test should be changed?)
creator: wenger
